text: Eadward kyng gret Aylmer bisscop & Alfger erl & Toly and alle mine theynes on Suffolke frendlike.

And ic kithe ihu þat ic wille þat þe half nigende hundred sokne þe ic habbe ihiuen God and Seynt Eadmunde mine mey þat it liggen into þat halegen minstre at Eadmundes biri so ful and so forth so mine moder it fermist aihte.
And it Alfrich Withgares sune hire to hande biwiste and it sithen me seluen on honde stoden.
& ic ne am becnowe þat ic ani man uthe þenen ut neyther ne hamsokne ne grithbreche ne forstal ne fichtwite ne hebberethef ne non þere rithte þa thider in mid rithte ibereð be fullen wite.
